helpText:
ğŸ¤– **Aá´ á´€ÉªÊŸá´€Ê™ÊŸá´‡ á´„á´á´á´á´€É´á´…s:**

â€¢ <prefix>ping
â”” `check if alive or not`

â€¢ <prefix>repo
â”” `show the bot source code`

â€¢ <prefix>start | <prefix>help
â”” `show the help for commands`

â€¢ <prefix>mode | <prefix>switch
â”” `switch the stream mode (audio/video)`

â€¢ <prefix>p | <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
â”” `play a song in vc, if already playing add to queue`

â€¢ <prefix>radio | <prefix>stream [radio url | stream link]
â”” `play a live stream in vc, if already playing add to queue`

â€¢ <prefix>pl | <prefix>playlist [youtube playlist link]
â”” `play the whole youtube playlist at once`

â€¢ <prefix>skip | <prefix>next
â”” `skip to the next song`

â€¢ <prefix>m | <prefix>mute
â”” `mute the current stream`

â€¢ <prefix>um | <prefix>unmute
â”” `unmute the muted stream`

â€¢ <prefix>ps | <prefix>pause
â”” `pause the current stream`

â€¢ <prefix>rs | <prefix>resume
â”” `resume the paused stream`

â€¢ <prefix>list | <prefix>queue
â”” `show the songs in the queue`

â€¢ <prefix>mix | <prefix>shuffle
â”” `shuffle the queued playlist`

â€¢ <prefix>loop | <prefix>repeat
â”” `enable or disable the loop mode`

â€¢ <prefix>lang | language [language code]
â”” `set the bot language in a group`

â€¢ <prefix>ip | <prefix>import
â”” `import queue from exported file`

â€¢ <prefix>ep | <prefix>export
â”” `export the queue for import in future`

â€¢ <prefix>stop | <prefix>leave
â”” `leave from vc and clear the queue`

â€¢ <prefix>restart | <prefix>update
â”” `restart and update your music player userbot`
